rpo.legacyResources.oldHorsey.tooltip: Adds an additional 'neigh' sound effect to the horse's idle sounds
rpo.legacyResources.oldSkelebone.tooltip: Replaces the Skeleton's hurt and death sounds with their LE counterparts
rpo.legacyResources.oldExp.tooltip: Replaces the Experience Level Up sound with the original, longer sound used in LE and before JE 1.4.2
rpo.legacyResources.dog.tooltip: Extends the 'Cat' music disc to include the 'Dog' track
